description:
Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he`ll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi`s big brother risks his own life in heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Haiboku!? Hody Fukushuu no Toki
Luffy Loses the Fight?! Hordy`s Long-Awaited Revenge!
Luffy défait ? La vengeance de Hody
ルフィ敗北!?ホーディ復讐の時
